ModMetaData.name: RimTalk Memory Patch
ModMetaData.author: Community Enhancement
ModMetaData.description:
为 RimTalk 提供记忆系统支持！
Memory system support for RimTalk!
核心功能 / Core Features： • 记忆系统 - 殖民者记住互动、工作和活动 • 记忆 UI - 查看和管理记忆 • 公共 API - RimTalk 可调用记忆数据 • 长短期记忆 - 自动管理和衰减 • 记忆去重 - 避免重复内容
Memory system - Colonists remember interactions, work, and activities Memory UI - View and manage memories Public API - RimTalk can access memory data Short/long-term memory - Auto-managed with decay Deduplication - Avoids repetitive content
---
使用方法 / How to use： 1. 启用 Harmony 2. 启用 RimTalk (cj.rimtalk) 3. 启用此补丁 (cj.rimtalk.memorypatch) 4. 重启游戏
1. Enable Harmony 2. Enable RimTalk (cj.rimtalk) 3. Enable this patch (cj.rimtalk.memorypatch) 4. Restart game
---
RimTalk 集成 / RimTalk Integration： 本 Mod 提供记忆数据支持。 RimTalk 原作者可通过公共 API 调用记忆系统，让对话更有上下文。
This mod provides memory data support. RimTalk authors can integrate via public API for context-aware conversations.
详细文档 / Documentation： 查看 Mod 文件夹中的文档 See documentation in mod folder
---
此 Mod 是 RimTalk 的增强补丁，不覆盖原版功能，仅添加记忆系统。 This is an enhancement patch for RimTalk. It does not override original features.
